entry.title: Lodanna - Two Drawer Night Stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Furniture
Price: 429.99

Reminiscent of Hollywood glamour of yesteryear, this nightstand interprets luxury in a decidedly modern way. Dazzling gray finish with faceted chrome-tone accents enhance the star power, while two smooth gliding drawers provide convenient bedside storage. Best of both worlds, nightstand includes USB or wireless device charging stations.

Product Features
  • Made of engineered wood
  • Replicated wood grain
  • Faceted chrome-tone metal pulls and accents
  • 2 smooth-operating drawers
  • USB and wireless charging options
  • Power cord included; UL Listed
  • Drawers lined with faux linen laminate
  • Assembly required
Dimensions:
Inches: 23.66" W x 15.67" D x 24.37" H

entry.title: Kanwyn - Three Drawer Night Stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Furniture
Price: 529.99

Give your retreat vintage charm and valuable bedside storage with this 3-drawer nightstand. In a beautifully distressed whitewashed finish, two drawers and a smaller top accessory drawer will help you keep bedtime essentials nearby in casual style. Generously scaled moulding from top to bottom, along with bun feet and drawer handles with a transitional aesthetic, give this nightstand character—invoking the feel of a quaint cottage escape.

Product Features
  • Made with solid wood, veneers and engineered wood
  • Distressed whitewashed finish
  • 2 smooth-gliding drawers, plus 1 small-scale top accessory drawer
  • Dark gray pewter-tone finished metal hardware
Dimensions:
Inches: 28" W x 17" D x 27.75" H

Starry, starry nights. Inspired by Hollywood glam, this richly styled nightstand steals the show in a simply stunning way. The nightstand’s replicated walnut grain is enriched with a high-gloss black finish, made even more dramatic with a strip of sleek silver glitter banding that accentuates a clean-lined, contemporary aesthetic. A discreetly positioned USB charging station makes it all the more accommodating.

entry.title: Jorstad - Two Drawer Night Stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Furniture
Price: 279.99

This nightstand is all about subtle detailing. Classic Louis Phillippe styling with gorgeous top moulding and scalloped-edge feet instantly grabs your attention. Light gray hue offers a clean and crisp appearance for a fresh spin on traditional design. Antiqued brass-tone knobs build visual contrast while making it easy for you to pull out the spacious drawers.

Product Features
  • Made of wood, engineered wood and veneers
  • 2 smooth-gliding drawers with dovetail construction
  • Knobs in antiqued brass-tone finish


About Jorstad
With a clean light gray finish flowing over the classic Louis Phillippe styling, the “Jorstad” bedroom collection flawlessly captures the essence of relaxed traditional design. The ogee shaped top moulding and bracket feet along with the upholstered panel sleigh headboard with a textural gray-white fabric adorned with nail head detailing creates a beautiful bedroom collection you’ll be proud to own.

Dimensions:
Inches: 21.25" W x 15.75" D x 23.75" H

entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Furniture
Price: 649.99

Opposites attract. This nightstand opens our eyes to how casually rustic styling and an industrial hip vibe make for one happy marriage. entry.title: Sommerford - Two Drawer Night Stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Furniture
Price: 649.99

Load up on character and scale back on fuss. As this 2-drawer nightstand proves to perfection—less is more. Crafted of reclaimed pine, its ultra clean-lined, chunky profile showcases long butcher-block planking rich with tonal variation, nicks, notches, nail holes and a whole lot of raw beauty. The drawers and middle shelf offer ample room for keeping essentials within reach from bed. Metal leg brackets add a modern touch with an open look.

Product Features
  • Made with reclaimed pine wood
  • Light grayish brown finish
  • Silver/bronze-tone hardware
  • 2 smooth-operating drawers with dovetail construction, 1 open shelf
  • Metal leg brackets
  • Assembly required
